COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Steve Holm
Cardinals shortstop Cesar Izturis left the game due to an injured arm
Marlins first baseman Mike Jacobs left the game due to an injured hand/wrist
Cardinals third baseman Troy Glaus left the game due to an injured arm

ej,moliy001,P,schrp901,Balls and strikes while catching ej,larut101,M,schrp901,Balls and strikes $the first pitch to Corey Hart was low and outside; Cardinals catcher Yadier Molina asked HP umpire Paul Schreiber where the pitch was and was ejected by Schreiber; Cardinals manager Tony LaRussa also was ejected by Schreiber; Molina took off his catching gear and left it at Schreiber's feet
Brewers pitcher David Riske left the game due to an injured elbow
Debut game for Luis Maza
$Debut for umpire Chris Tiller
$Strike 2 was called when Brian McCann refused swveral times to get in batter's box and umpire Mark Wegner ordered Jeff Suppan to pitch
Twins right fielder Michael Cuddyer left the game due to an injured hand/wrist

$Scott Baker struck out four batters in one inning to tie the major league record; he became the first Twins pitcher to perform this feat and the first in the majors since Brad Penny (Dodgers) on 9/23/2006

ej,gardr001,M,rungb901,Not allowing time for batter $Brendan Harris tried to call timeout before the third pitch; he stepped out and was adjusting his helmet; HP umpire Brian Runge did not grant time and when Guillermo Mota threw the pitch, Runge called Harris out on strikes; Harris argued with Runge but Twins manager Ron Gardenhire intervened and was ejected by Runge

ej,gagne001,P,eddid901,Intentionally throwing at batter $ball four to Jim Edmonds from Eric Gagne went behind Edmonds; Brewers pitcher Eric Gagne ejected by HP umpire Doug Eddings
fan interference

ej,fielp001,P,eddid901,Balls and strikes $Brewers first baseman Prince Fielder ejected by HP umpire Doug Eddings for arguing about the strike zone after he was out; he took a long time to leave the dugout while still yelling at Eddings, so the game was delayed until Fielder left
Brewers left fielder Ryan Braun left the game due to an injured back
Pirates catcher Ryan Doumit left the game due to flu-like symptoms

$Adam LaRoche argued with HP umpire Bob Davidson about the called third strike

ej,laroa001,P,davib902,Called third strike; one inning later ej,russj002,M,davib902,Arguing the ejection of LaRoche $Pirates first baseman Adam LaRoche yelled again as he left the field and was ejected by Davidson; Pirates Manager John Russell ran out to argue and got into a shouting match with Davidson; they had to be separated by crew chief Mike Reilly; Russell was ejected by Davidson
Brewers pitcher Ben Sheets left the game due to an injured groin
